name: DUNGEMS
description:
YOUR DUNGEON IS UNDER ATTACK! 

A horde of heroes from a nearby castle is on their way to ransack your dungeon. Build traps and employ mobs to defend your treasure.

Dungems is a mix of tactics and tower defence. Invading heroes from nearby castles will try and outwit your dungeon designs - using spells, charms and shields to get around your obstacles...

Outwit the heroes to keep you treasure intact.  Use the bones of fallen enemies to unlock tower packs and upgrades.  Use these upgrades to take on even bigger hordes of heroes. 

Create a perfect deck of monsters and mechanical traps - pick the right pieces to make mince meat of the men.

FEATURES 
  • 🏹  Six different upgradable towers - each tower with it's own individual tech tree 
  • 🔨  Five unique mobs - each with their own unique characteristics and available to assist you in your defence 
  • 💀  Complete objectives and earn enough gold to attract bosses into your dungeon
  • 🃏  Build a deck of the perfect traps & mobs to defend your dungeon
  • 🎲  Twenty-five waves of madness over five unique and expandable dungeons
  • 🥠 Battle and build against unique hero's with special abilities 
LIFECYCLE

The game is a work in progress. Made with a lot of love and mistakes.

We're releasing onto itch to get initial feedback, test what works and figure out what to do next.

If you like (or dislike) the game - please leave us some feedback! 
We'll be updating the game regularly and would love to hear your brain thinky's.
